thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: Ian Kerridge

author: Ian Kerridge
title: Ian Kerridge
text: As a first time buyer I was slightly cautious about the size of my first order but any fear I had was totally unnecessary. Part of my order was out of stock but Mikey from customer services politely emailed me to say my purchase may be a day or two late. Even offering an instant refund if I wasn't happy to wait. To my surprise the pads I'd ordered Sunday did in fact still arrive by Thursday. Most companies wont take the time to personally email customers let alone ones with such small orders so Micks Garage has been more than impressive. Won't hesitate to use them again come MOT time. Thanks
